
``stack_spatlocs``
======================

stack_spatlocs

Description
-----------

Adds z values and combines list of spatlocs into single z-stacked spatloc table

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   stack_spatlocs(spatlocs_list, z_vals)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``spatlocs_list``
     - list of spatial locations
   * - ``z_vals``
     - z values to use for z stacking spatial locations list
